dahlia-blossom.name: Dahlia Blossom
dahlia-blossom.desc: The pieces of this set are gained by killing the boss inside the Dark Grotto dungeon in the Sandydale Basin realm.

tenth-cavalry.name: Tenth Cavalry
tenth-cavalry.desc: The pieces of this set are gained by killing monsters in the Old Town dungeon in the final map Royal Hollow.

blessed-tenth.name: Blessed Tenth
blessed-tenth.desc: The pieces of this set are gained by killing monsters in the Old Town dungeon in the final map Royal Hollow.

tenth-guard.name: Tenth Guard
tenth-guard.desc: The pieces of this set are gained by killing monsters in the Old Town dungeon in the final map Royal Hollow.

tenth-defender.name: Tenth Defender
tenth-defender.desc: The pieces of this set are gained by killing monsters in the Old Town dungeon in the final map Royal Hollow.

cow-costume.name: Cow Costume
cow-costume.desc: This set can be crafted using the Artisan skill, only players with Artisan skill can equip it.

festive-costume.name: Festive Costume
festive-costume.desc: This set can be crafted using the Artisan skill, all players can equip it.

halloween-costume.name: Halloween Costume
halloween-costume.desc: This set can be crafted using the Artisan skill, all players can equip it.

myzan-defenders.name: Myzan Defenders
myzan-defenders.desc: Pieces are gained by getting faction points with the Myzan Defenders faction.

dark-hollow-clan.name: Dark Hollow Clan
dark-hollow-clan.desc: Pieces are gained by getting faction points with the Dark Hollow Clan faction.

cookie-costume.name: Cookie Costume
cookie-costume.desc: This set can be crafted using the Artisan skill, only players with Artisan skill can equip it.

goblin-costume.name: Goblin Costume
goblin-costume.desc: This set can be crafted using the Artisan skill, only players with Artisan skill can equip it.

frankenstein-set.name: Frankenstein Set
frankenstein-set.desc: Made up of surgery crafted body parts ... how delightful.

elemental-set.name: Elemental Set
elemental-set.desc: A complete set of Elemental armor provides useful bonuses.

afterlife-set.name: Afterlife Set
afterlife-set.desc: A complete set of Afterlife armor is spooky.

makers-set.name: Makers Set
makers-set.desc: A complete set of Makers armor may very well improve the size of your Queue and other things!

inventor-bolted-set.name: Inventor Bolted Set
inventor-bolted-set.desc: A set of items made by the Junker, Clockwork or War Machine classes.

inventor-severed-set.name: Inventor Severed Set
inventor-severed-set.desc: A set of items made by the Stitchworker, Flesh Dealer or Mutilator class.

inventor-basic-set.name: Inventor Basic Set
inventor-basic-set.desc: A set of items made by the Inventory class using the Augmenting skill.

inventor-riveted-set.name: Inventor Riveted Set
inventor-riveted-set.desc: A set of items made by the Junker, Clockwork or War Machine classes.

inventor-stitched-set.name: Inventor Stitched Set
inventor-stitched-set.desc: A set of items made by the Stitchworker, Flesh Dealer or Mutilator class.

arthurian-set.name: Arthurian Set
arthurian-set.desc: A set of items gained from the Pets of Legends [Arthurian] themed content.

tinman-set.name: Tinman Set
tinman-set.desc: Level 1000 Legend armor set, you must be level 1000 and complete the necessary dungeon quests to gain access to this set.

frankenstein.name: Frankenstein
frankenstein.desc: Level 1000 Legend armor set, you must be level 1000 and complete the necessary dungeon quests to gain access to this set.
